frontmatter.title: Important Update: Removal of CentOS 7 Eclipse Temurin Images
frontmatter.author: georgeadams
frontmatter.description: We would like to inform our users that as of the next PSU release on July 16th, Eclipse Temurin images with the CentOS 7 base will be removed.

frontmatter.title: External audit of Temurin build and distribution processes
Important Update: Removal of CentOS 7 Eclipse Temurin Images
frontmatter.author: georgeadams
